articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: After latest victory, Giro d'Italia leader Tadej Pogačar defends strategy of winning as many stages as possible - Cyclingnews
articles.description: ‘I’m 100% sure some guys are annoyed, but I’m racing for the team that pays me’ says Slovenian
articles.content: Giro d’Italia leader Tadej Pogačar (UAE Team Emirates) blasted to his second stage win in 24 hours and third of this year’s race so far on Saturday, then brushed aside rival riders’ annoyance that he… [+5306 chars]
